item.title: The Fed cut its interest rate, but long-term rates — including those on mortgages — went higher
item.description: Ten- and 30-year Treasury yields rose this week after the central bank cut its short-term interest rate.

item.title: Steve Bannon floats idea of Bessent running both Treasury and the Fed
item.description: White House confidante Steve Bannon has an unusual solution for who should take over as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell next year.

item.title: Germany was billed as Europe's growth driver. Now economists are saying: Not so fast
item.description: Germany was a hub of excitement earlier this year amid high hopes of an economic rebound — domestically, and across Europe.

item.title: Hassett says Fed made 'prudent call,' signaling White House OK with quarter-point cut
item.description: In a CNBC interview Thursday, Hassett noted that the administration, and new Fed Governor Stephen Miran, had been pushing for a bigger reduction.

item.title: Sales of heavy trucks are falling like the U.S. is headed for a recession
item.description: Heavy trucks sales have dropped to levels not seen in four years, according to the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis.
